content:
I'm so glad you liked the ideas! I think it's great that you're incorporating the Leprechaun Treasure Hunt and Pin the Shamrock on the Leprechaun games into your party. The Leprechaun's Mischief Station is also a fantastic way to get guests involved and creative. 

Traditional Irish music is a great choice for setting the tone and atmosphere for your St. Patrick's Day party. The Dubliners, The Chieftains, and The Pogues are all excellent choices for traditional Irish music. If you want something a bit more modern, Flogging Molly and Dropkick Murphys are great options. You can also consider creating a playlist with a mix of traditional and modern Irish music to cater to different tastes.

Remember to have fun and get creative with your decorations, food, and drinks to create an immersive Leprechaun-themed experience! If you need any more help or have any other questions, feel free to ask. Sláinte!
